Text:
In all torrent clients I know (which are actually not that many) you can choose to make a torrent of a single file or a folder. You could put all your files and choose the folder option.

I hope it helps.
You have nothing to apolagise for - I thank you for taking the time and effort to share.
Many thanks this will truly help as I am preparing a friend's son to become A+ Certified. Thanks again!
